LEFT JOIN not_members nm ON r.member_code = nm.member_code WHERE nm.email = (SELECT email FROM not_members nm2 WHERE nm2.member_code = #{memberCode})

mapper.select: SELECT tbl.* FROM (SELECT r.*, hr.room_count, hr.room_count - (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM room_reservation rr WHERE rr.hotel_code = hr.hotel_code AND rr.room_code = hr.room_code AND rr.check_in_date <= #{checkInDate} AND rr.check_out_date >= #{checkOutDate}) AS remain_room_cnt FROM hotel_rooms hr LEFT JOIN rooms r ON hr.room_code = r.room_code WHERE hr.hotel_code = #{hotelCode}) tbl WHERE remain_room_cnt > 0

SELECT tbl.* FROM (SELECT res.*, res.res_tables - (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM dining_reservation dr WHERE dr.hotel_code = #{hotelCode} AND dr.res_code = res.res_code AND dr.reservation_date = #{reservationDate} AND dr.reservation_time = #{reservationTime}) AS remain_tables FROM res ) tbl WHERE remain_tables > 0

SELECT tbl2.member_code FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS rn, tbl.member_code FROM (SELECT member_code FROM not_members WHERE email = #{email} AND name = #{name} AND tel = #{tel} ORDER BY member_code DESC) tbl ) tbl2 WHERE rn = 1

SELECT ((SELECT COUNT(*) AS dining FROM dining_reservation dr LEFT JOIN not_members nm ON dr.member_code = nm.member_code WHERE dr.reservation_code = #{reservationCode} AND nm.email = #{email})+(SELECT COUNT(*) AS room FROM room_reservation rr LEFT JOIN not_members nm2 ON rr.member_code = nm2.member_code WHERE rr.reservation_code = #{reservationCode} AND nm2.email = #{email})) AS cnt FROM dual
